name: Flappy Z - A Zemmour Fan Game
name_original: Flappy Z - A Zemmour Fan Game
description:
Flappy Z is a game in the style of "Flappy Bird" in which you play as Eric Zemmour, a famous French politician who must dodge the French border signs

DISCLAIMER: This game is in no way related or affiliated with Eric Zemmour and his teams. It is not intended to denigrate him either.

This game is there to make people laugh and not to make controversy. So please respect the comment space :D

Have Fun !

Minethan
